name: dragon-breath
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Strikes the foe with an incredible blast of breath.
flavor_text.emerald: Strikes the foe with an incredible blast of breath.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is hit with an incredible blast of breath that may also paralyze.
